Public Remarks: Trim & Fit Price!! Enjoy this private 5.32-acre lot just minutes from Fraser Lake. There is a building site already cleared and ready to go. A great place to just get away or build a house. Lots of wildlife in the area, and plenty of recreational activities to enjoy in this peaceful setting.

One Bedroom ground level corner appartment unit in the Granisle Resort that is currently in the rental pool. It is in walking distance to the Granisle Marine on Babine Lake. Enjoy a great view of the lake from through the Kitchen patio doors or from under the deck. Babine lake is a block away and offers excellent boating / fishing opportunities. Furniture will be included. Enjoy the fishing, hiking and exploring the Granisle area, and when away put the unit into the rental pool to help pay for the cost. The Strata fees include the Hydro and Heat.

Looking for a larger lot? Then check out this smaller home on 80x200 lot located close to primary & elementary schools. Present home has nominal value, so you may take it down to build your new home or put your new mobile home on it.

This lovely end unit on the 4th floor, is so peaceful and quiet! Affordable living at its best! This 2-bedroom unit has the added advantage of an extra window in the dining room, allowing light to flood into the main living area. Now is the time to own your very own apartment in a well-maintained strata with a great reputation!

Public Remarks: Excellent 1.23 acre residential lot located near Dragon Lake, Quesnel. Flat lot easy to build on and close to city amenities. Property priced attractively and will sell quickly. Seller may consider financing to a qualified Buyer.
Realtor Remarks: File 5742.

Public Remarks: Solid, 3 bedroom, 2 bath home in Granisle. This house has had numerous upgrades including siding, doors, windows, flooring, and hot water tank (2 years old). Features include a large pellet stove installed 2 years ago, central vac system, a jetted tub in the main bath, and a propane cook stove. Blow-in insulation was added to the attic 2 years ago, the deck ha been replaced, and the house has been painted. The basement is fully finished with a rec room, 3pc bath, storage, laundry, and bedroom. A large garage/shop on a concrete slab is attached to the house. The yard is landscaped with flowers. Small storage shed in the backyard. Views of Babine Lake from the front of the house. Private backyard.

The perfect starter or retirement home! This 1995 doublewide modular home features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The spacious kitchen features loads of cupboard and counter space, large skylight, and is also open to the living room and dining areas. The master suite features a 3 piece ensuite with walk-in shower and large skylight. At the other side of the home you'll find 2 more good sized bedrooms and a full 4 piece bathroom also with skylight. There is also a separate laundry room. Recent upgrades include new roof shingles in 2016 and new skirting all around. This home is also wheelchair accessible. Quick possession is available!
Realtor Remarks: Wood block foundation.

Public Remarks: Move-in ready! This bright and spacious 3 bedroom modular home has beautiful mountain views. This home has had many upgrades over the last few months including new paint throughout, new high efficient furnace with 10 year warranty (Feb 2018), new roof, skirting & deck (Nov 2017), new fridge, stove, washer, dryer. Updated flooring in the living room and master bedroom.  The open kitchen and living room is a great space for entertaining. Quick possession is available.
Realtor Remarks: Agent is related to the sellers.  Land has been elevated above 200 year flood line. Lock box on home.  Seller is in the process of updating the park and removing trees.  The park will be cleaned up with all debris removed once the snow is gone.
